com.shop.util.generic
Class GenericIOLineProcessor<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.shop.util.generic.GenericIOLineProcessor<T>

public class GenericIOLineProcessor<T>
extends java.lang.Object

Utility to read lines from a client in a loop. Instances maintain an internal threaded-loop that reads a line from the client and then calls the given line acceptor for processing
